tier.item: (55) Karl hielp de mijnwerker die de boswachter vond.
`Karl helped the mineworker who __ found the forester.'
`Karl helped the mineworker who the forester found __.'

(60) Welke patienten meende Jan dat de dokters bezochten?
a. Which patients did Jan mean that __ are visiting the doctors?
b. Which patients did Jan mean that the doctors are visiting __?

a. Which patients did Jan mean that __ are visiting the doctors?
b. Which patients did Jan mean that the doctors are visiting __?

Which patients did Jan mean that __ are visiting the doctors? b. Which patients did Jan mean that the doctors are visiting __?
(61) Chi pensi abbia licenziato il metalmeccanico sensa preavviso?
a. Who do you think __ fired the steel-worker without notice?
b. Who do you think the steel-worker fired __ without notice?

(75) Chi ha licenziato il metalmeccanico/il proprietario senza dare il
preavviso?
`Who fired the steel-worker/the owner without giving notice?'
`Who did the steel-worker/the owner fire without giving notice?'
(75) Chi ha licenziato il metalmeccanico/il proprietario senza dare il
preavviso?
`Who fired the steel-worker/the owner without giving notice?'
`Who did the steel-worker/the owner fire without giving notice?'
Chi ha licenziato il metalmeccanico/il proprietario senza dare il preavviso?

(79) a. tuo fratello, a cui mi domando che storie abbiano raccontato
your brother, to whom myself I-ask which stories they have told
